animeTitle: NG Knight Ramune & 40 DX: Wakuwaku Jikuu - Honoo no Daisousasen
animeDescription: Lamune and Da Cider head off to Puff-Puff Palace to rescue two beautiful barely clothed maidens, Gold Mountain and Silver Mountain- the Mountain Duo. This of course infuriates Milk and Leska, who with a rather confused and unwilling Cocoa "transform" into "Seinaru Milky", "Seinaru Cacao", and "Seinaru Lemon". The three then head after their would-be boyfriends to extract their revenge.(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: NG Knight Ramune & 40 EX: Biku Biku Triangle Ai no Arashi Daisakusen', 'Sequel: VS Knight Lamune & 40 Fire']
